name: Mountain Dwarf Soldier
description: The Mountain Dwarf Soldier is a resilient warrior known for its combat proficiency and sturdy build.
memorable: Possesses tactical movement abilities allowing for repositioning without provoking attacks.
goals: To engage effectively in combat while supporting allies.
relations: Can be found alongside other dwarves or in military units.
environment: Typically found in mountainous regions or battlefields.
strengths: Enhanced combat capabilities in both melee and ranged situations, good coordination with allies.
weaknesses: Average intelligence, wisdom, and charisma limits their interaction and problem-solving capabilities.
attacks: Attacks with a handaxe in melee or ranged, deals slashing damage; also uses a heavy crossbow for ranged attacks.
most_powerful_ability: Tactical Movement allows for strategic repositioning in battle without risking opportunity attacks.
senses: Has a passive perception of 12, aiding in detecting hidden creatures or traps.
skills: Proficient in perception and survival, both with a modifier of +2.
additional_information: Good saving throws in Strength and Constitution
Effective in group tactics enhancing damage
Possesses both melee and ranged weapon options
